text: Tajin ketzijon na ri Pedro rachiꞌl ri Juan kukꞌ ri winaq are xoꞌpan ri chꞌawenelabꞌ cho ri Dios, xuqujeꞌ ri kꞌamal bꞌe kech ri chajil rech ri Templo je xuqujeꞌ jujun chike ri saduceos.4:1 Ri saduceos are kabꞌan ke pwiꞌ ri templo. Ri saduceos pa ri kikꞌutuꞌn kakibꞌij chi ri e kaminaqibꞌ man kekꞌastaj taj. Rumal riꞌ sibꞌalaj e yojtanij rukꞌ ri kikꞌutuꞌn ri tijoxelabꞌ. Lucas 20:27.
